buttonClass.description: The class name of the user-authorized button in the component, which can be used to customize the style
buttonClass.description_zh: 组件中用户授权按钮的类名，可用于自定义样式

checkedColor.description: The color of the user authorization check box in the component is the same as the color of the CSS
checkedColor.description_zh: 组件中用户授权勾选框选中时的颜色，同 CSS 的 color

themeColor.description: The theme color will be applied to the "User Authorization Button Background Color" and "User Authorization Button Background Color" and "User Authorization Button Background Color" after settingNote: theme-color has a lower priority than button-class and checked-color, and when button-class exists, theme-color does not take effect
themeColor.description_zh: 主题颜色，设置后将应用于 “用户授权按钮背景色” 和 “用户授权勾选框选中时的颜色”注：theme-color 的优先级低于 button-class 和 checked-color，且当 button-class 存在时，theme-color 不生效

onGetPhoneNumber.description: After the user completes the authorization, the user obtains the user's mobile phone number: if the value of detail.errMsg is "getPhoneNumber:ok", the user information is successfully obtained, and if the detail.errMsg value is "getPhoneNumber:fail auth deny", the user information is not obtained. Refer to Signature, Verification, Encryption and Decryption of User Data to process user data and obtain user mobile phone numbers. Example of decrypted data of the user's mobile phone number: {"mobile":"15000000000"}1. Non-individual developers can apply;2. After the review is passed, go to the home page of the Mini Program and click Settings -> Development Settings on the left navigation bar. On the drop-down page, click Apply for Permission to Obtain a User's Mobile Phone Number
onGetPhoneNumber.description_zh: 用户完成授权后，获取用户手机号：detail.errMsg 值为"getPhoneNumber:ok" 时代表用户信息获取成功；detail.errMsg 值为"getPhoneNumber:fail auth deny"时代表用户信息获取失败。参考 用户数据的签名验证和加解密 对用户数据进行处理获得用户手机号。用户手机号信息解密后数据示例：{"mobile":"15000000000"}1. 非个人开发者可申请；2. 审核通过后，进入小程序首页,在左侧导航栏单击“设置 -> 开发设置”。下拉页面，在“获取用户手机号权限申请”中单击“申请开通”
